EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your Circulation Feedback
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for visiting Subscriber Services. Your comments have been forwarded to Customer Service. If you have any questions, please call Customer Service at 215-222-2765
Don't forget if your subscription package includes unlimited digital access, you can start browsing at Philly.com or you can access The Inquirer and Daily News replica's available to you from anywhere at any time!
Have questions? We're here to help!
215-222-2765 | digitalsupport@inquirer.com
Monday- Friday: 6:30 a.m - 3:00 p.m.
Saturday-Sunday: 7:30 a.m. - 12:00 p.m.
